an4.264:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.264:1.3: Attana ca panatipati hoti, paranca panatipate samadapeti, panatipate ca samanunno hoti, panatipatassa ca vannam bhasati—
an4.264:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.264:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.264:2.3: Attana ca panatipata pativirato hoti, paranca panatipata veramaniya samadapeti, panatipata veramaniya ca samanunno hoti, panatipata veramaniya ca vannam bhasati—
an4.264:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
